div.div:
VirtualService (non-mesh)
Namespace: my-app
- myservice-my-app.apps.serverless.devcluster.openshift.com
- myservice.my-app
- myservice.my-app
- myservice.my-app.svc
- myservice.my-app.svc.cluster.local

div.div:
Gateway
Namespace: knative-serving
Name: knative-local-gateway
Selector:
- Istio: ingressgateway
- Hosts: *.my-app.svc.cluster.local
Port: 443
Certs: for internal domain

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 268px; height: 1px; padding-top: 593px; margin-left: 884px;

div.div:
Gateway
Namespace: knative-serving
Name: knative-ingress-gateway
Selector:
- istio: ingressgateway
- Hosts: *
- Port: 443
Certs: for public domain

div.div:
Service + backing Pods
Namespace: my-app
Name: myservice-0001.my-app.svc.cluster.local
